stories.Title: Bard keeps expanding
stories.Description: Google's AI chatbot reaches a broader audience. Available in over 40 languages, and filled with innovative features, Bard aims to optimize productivity and achieve new levels of interaction.
stories.Tweet: Bard keeps expanding 📦 Google's AI chatbot reaches a broader audience. Available in over 40 languages, and filled with innovative features, Bard aims to optimize productivity and achieve new levels of interaction. #google https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/13/googles-bard-finally-lands-in-the-eu-now-supports-more-than-40-languages/

stories.Title: An old friend joins the AI community...
stories.Description: After months of speculation, Elon Musk is finally introducing xAI. The company plans to give a different outlook on AI research and find what the CEO calls "the true nature of the universe."
stories.Tweet: An old friend joins the AI community... 📦 After months of speculation, Elon Musk is finally introducing xAI. The company plans to give a different outlook on AI research and find what the CEO calls "the true nature of the universe." #ai https://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2023/07/musk-announces-new-ai-company-that-seeks-to-understand-the-universe/

stories.Title: GPT-4: It's not what it used to be
stories.Description: Users relying on GPT-4 are currently complaining about its capabilities. The degraded performance is likely due to OpenAI's pursuit of a significant cost-effective redesign.
stories.Tweet: GPT-4: It's not what it used to be 📦 Users relying on GPT-4 are currently complaining about its capabilities. The degraded performance is likely due to OpenAI's pursuit of a significant cost-effective redesign. #ai https://www.businessinsider.com/openai-gpt4-ai-model-got-lazier-dumber-chatgpt-2023-7

stories.Title: From sketch to “reality”
stories.Description: Stable Doodle, Stability AI's latest tool, brings your artwork to life like never before. With advanced AI algorithms that enable a seamless sketch-to-image transition.
stories.Tweet: From sketch to “reality” 📦 Stable Doodle, Stability AI's latest tool, brings your artwork to life like never before. With advanced AI algorithms that enable a seamless sketch-to-image transition. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/13/stability-ai-releases-stable-doodle-a-sketch-to-image-tool/

stories.Title: Life on Mars?
stories.Description: Organic compounds have been found by the Perseverance Rover. Although it's not conclusive proof that Mars once hosted life, researchers believe the discovery sheds light on the planet's origins.
stories.Tweet: Life on Mars? 📦 Organic compounds have been found by the Perseverance Rover. Although it's not conclusive proof that Mars once hosted life, researchers believe the discovery sheds light on the planet's origins. #space https://www.engadget.com/researchers-find-evidence-of-organic-matter-on-mars-174950850.html

stories.Title: Innovation meets astronomy
stories.Description: The Nautilus Space Observatory is a visionary concept in telescope technology. Its ultra-thin lens design promises to gather massive amounts of light, surpassing NASA's Webb.
stories.Tweet: Innovation meets astronomy 📦 The Nautilus Space Observatory is a visionary concept in telescope technology. Its ultra-thin lens design promises to gather massive amounts of light, surpassing NASA's Webb. #space https://theconversation.com/a-new-thin-lensed-telescope-design-could-far-surpass-james-webb-goodbye-mirrors-hello-diffractive-lenses-206055

stories.Title: An overview of China's lunar plans
stories.Description: Overcoming the lack of a super heavy-lift rocket with a two-launch strategy, China aims to achieve a crewed lunar surface mission by 2030.
stories.Tweet: An overview of China's lunar plans 📦 Overcoming the lack of a super heavy-lift rocket with a two-launch strategy, China aims to achieve a crewed lunar surface mission by 2030. #china https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/chinas-twin-rockets-for-crewed-lunar-landing

stories.Title: Stay tuned for India's moon journey
stories.Description: Chandrayaan 3, the mission with the goal of landing on the lunar surface is scheduled for launch on July 14.
stories.Tweet: Stay tuned for India's moon journey 📦 Chandrayaan 3, the mission with the goal of landing on the lunar surface is scheduled for launch on July 14. #india https://www.space.com/india-chandrayaan-3-moon-mission-launch-webcast

stories.Title: Find what’s new on iOS 17
stories.Description: Apple has released the public beta of iOS 17, giving users a chance to explore its latest features ahead of the official launch. Experience the new standby dock, bid farewell to "Hey Siri," and more.
stories.Tweet: Find what’s new on iOS 17 📦 Apple has released the public beta of iOS 17, giving users a chance to explore its latest features ahead of the official launch. Experience the new standby dock, bid farewell to "Hey Siri," and more. #apple https://www.cnbc.com/2023/07/12/apple-ios-17-public-beta-for-iphone-released.html

stories.Title: A sustainable ride to the moon
stories.Description: NASA has unveiled a new lineup of all-electric vehicles by Canoo Technologies, set to transport astronauts and essential equipment to the launchpad ahead of the Artemis mission.
stories.Tweet: A sustainable ride to the moon 📦 NASA has unveiled a new lineup of all-electric vehicles by Canoo Technologies, set to transport astronauts and essential equipment to the launchpad ahead of the Artemis mission. #NASA https://www.digitaltrends.com/space/new-nasa-evs-will-drive-crew-part-way-to-the-moon/

stories.Title: Behold, more Cyberleaks
stories.Description: A leaked image from Gigafactory Texas showcases a glimpse of Cybertruck's body-in-white, signaling progress in the manufacturing process of the parts that make this electric pickup unique.
stories.Tweet: Behold, more Cyberleaks 📦 A leaked image from Gigafactory Texas showcases a glimpse of Cybertruck's body-in-white, signaling progress in the manufacturing process of the parts that make this electric pickup unique. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/07/12/tesla-cybertruck-bodies-in-white-picture-leaks-gigafactory-texas/
